page.title: 13Blois Farm and Farm House.
page.content: Mr Price owns this farm.He farms 350 acres. He grows wheat, barley, beans, peas and oil seed rape.He has got a Dominator 86 Combine Harvester 5 Tractors , a Hedge trimmer and a crop sprayer. We also saw a very old seed drill. There are 9 bullocks, 5 chickens, some ducks and 2 peacocks. Mr Price has 1 person to help him. The{Farm House}is very old .Some of it dates from 1200. The doorways and ceilings have had to be raised because they were too low for people today. The house has been extended,leaving some interior windows.We think that the farm got its name from the Norman owner of the land.In 12th century the manor was inherited by Matilda, the daughter of Count Eustace 111 of Boulogne. She married{Stephen of {Blois.}Blois Farm lies on Blois Road.}
